metadata.synopsis: The player comments after entering one of the trial areas in the temple of Shar. If they read a book in the library before, they'll repeat a hint contained in it about how to complete the trial (defeat their double). Otherwise they'll plead ignorance.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter the trial area after having read/not read the hint book from the library.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The book was clear - I need to fight myself if I'm to pass this trial.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: The Dark Lady teaches us that we are our own worst enemy, much of the time. Her embrace will elude us until we shed that which holds us back.
1.context: NodeContext: Reverent, as if quoting religious teachings from memory. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: What am I supposed to do here...?
